reviewText: This is a fun collection of baby boomer life in the 50s, and 60s. I grew up in the 60s and 70s and they were truly marvelous years, sadly lost. Many of these shorts center around consumerism, like buying a house or going to the mall. They do however capture the flavor of those times, or at least, how we would like to remember them. In one short, the perfect mom makes chicken salad while in full make-up and a lovely dress. I also particularly liked Dateline Long Island, as that's were I grew up. Sigh! Those days a re long gone.
